thread.title: U.S. to move to 'phase 2' if North Korea sanctions don't work: Trump

title: U.S. to move to 'phase 2' if North Korea sanctions don't work: Trump
text:
U.S. to move to 'phase 2' if North Korea sanctions don't work: Trump 4:34pm EST - 01:12 
U.S. President Donald Trump said on Friday the United States would move to ''phase two'' if sanctions against North Korea did not work, although he did not specify what that would mean.   
U.S. President Donald Trump said on Friday the United States would move to "phase two" if sanctions against North Korea did not work, although he did not specify what that would mean.  //reut.rs/2CGOUqR
